Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents
    all methods have been moved to the BinaryImages class
    inra.ijpb.morphology.GeodesicReconstruction
    replaced by the Reconstruction class (2017.07.25)
    inra.ijpb.morphology.GeodesicReconstruction3D
    replaced by the Reconstruction class (2017.07.25)
    inra.ijpb.morphology.LabelImages
    as from 2014.11.03, replaced by class inra.ijpb.label.LabelImages
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform3D.applyWithSortedList()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.applyWithSortedList()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform3D.applyWithSortedListAndDams()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.applyWithSortedListAndDams()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents.computeLabels(ImagePlus, int, int)
    replaced by BinaryImages.componentsLabeling(ImagePlus, int, int)
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents.computeLabels(ImageProcessor, int, int)
    replaced by BinaryImages.componentsLabeling(ImageProcessor, int, int)
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents.computeLabels(ImageStack, int, int)
    replaced by BinaryImages.componentsLabeling(ImageStack, int, int)
    inra.ijpb.measure.GeometricMeasures2D.croftonPerimeter(ImageProcessor, double[], int)
    use analyzeRegions instead
    inra.ijpb.plugins.GeodesicDistanceMapPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, ImagePlus, String, float[])
    inra.ijpb.plugins.GeodesicDistanceMapPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, ImagePlus, String, float[], boolean)
    use process method instead
    inra.ijpb.plugins.GeodesicDistanceMapPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, ImagePlus, String, short[], boolean)
    use process method instead
    inra.ijpb.plugins.RegionMorphometryPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, int)
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MicrostructureAnalysisPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, int)
    specify porosity
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MicrostructureAnalysisPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, int, boolean)
    use process method instead
    inra.ijpb.plugins.ExtendBordersPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, int, int, int, int, BorderManager)
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MorphologicalFilterPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, Morphology.Operation, Strel)
    use the process method instead
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MaxInscribedSpherePlugin.exec(ImagePlus, short[])
    replaced by process method
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MaxInscribedCirclePlugin.exec(ImagePlus, short[])
    replaced by process method
    inra.ijpb.plugins.ChamferDistanceMapPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, String, float[], boolean)
    inra.ijpb.plugins.ChamferDistanceMapPlugin.exec(ImagePlus, String, short[], boolean)
    inra.ijpb.plugins.GeodesicDiameterPlugin.exec(ImageProcessor, float[])
    use process method instead
    inra.ijpb.morphology.FloodFill.floodFill(ImageStack, int, int, int, double, int)
    use FLoodFill3D.floodFill instead
    inra.ijpb.morphology.FloodFill.floodFill(ImageStack, int, int, int, ImageStack, int, int)
    use FloodFill3D.floodFill instead
    inra.ijpb.morphology.FloodFill.floodFill(ImageStack, int, int, int, int, int)
    use FloodFill3D.floodFill instead.
    inra.ijpb.morphology.FloodFill.floodFillFloat(ImageStack, int, int, int, ImageStack, float, int)
    use FloodFill3D.floodFillFloat instead
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.getAnimationSortedList()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.getAnimationSortedListAndDams()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MorphologicalSegmentation.segment(String, String, String, String)
    the priority queue method is now the only one
